description.en:
Hansoo Kang was an average boy living in the normal world when he was suddenly summoned to Fantasia, a fantasy world run by demons!

Deemed the Chosen Hero, he’s spent the last ten years building himself up to defeat the lord of Fantasia - which turned out to be a piece of cake.

As he eagerly awaits his return to the real world, the “god” of Fantasia appears and throws a wrench in his plan: a report card that reveals there’s more to being a hero than just might.
description.ja:
史上最悪に性格の悪い勇者が誕生？！ いきなりファンタジー世界に召喚されてから10年間、苦労してやっと魔王を倒した。 ようやく元の世界に戻れると思ったその瞬間、ファンタジー世界の神から通知表を出されるが、 魔王を倒す過程で邪魔になるものは全て殺したせいで人格の評価がFになっていた。 もう一度最初からファンタジー世界の冒険をやり直すことになり… 果たして元の世界には戻れるのか？

---
**Links:**
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/33711)
description.ko:
주인공 강한수는 판타지아 세계로 소환된 뒤 
10년의 고생 끝에 마왕을 쓰러뜨린다.

이제 원래 세계로 돌아가는 건가, 행복해 하는 찰나. 
판타지 세계의 신으로부터 성적표가 날아온다.

마왕 살해에 방해되는 요소를 모조리 치워가면서 왔더니 
인성 점수가 F로 나와버렸다!

이어지는 회귀, 판타지 세계의 모험을 
처음부터 다시 시작해야 한다.

과연 강한수는 무한한 회귀를 끝낼 수 있을까.
description.ru: Когда ценой жизни своих товарищей герой добрался до замка Владыки Демонов и одолел его хозяина, ему нужно было только одно – возвращение на землю. Весь этот мир и люди, его населяющие, не стоили для парня ни гроша. Однако, вместо того, чтобы вернуться обратно домой, он получил ранг F за всё, что натворил. Ублюдку F-ранга придется начать все заново!
description.pt-br: O protagonista Kang Han Soo matou o rei demônio Dez anos após ter sido invocado no reino de fantasia. Agora é hora de ser mandado de volta para a Terra. O que é isso? O deus do mundo de fantasia apareceu com o seu boletim. Por ter removido todos os obstáculos que o impediam de matar o rei demônio, sua pontuação de personalidade foi F. O retrocesso que segue é que ele deve retornar ao começo e começar tudo de novo. Kang Han Soo conseguirá acabar com esses retornos sem fim?

description.ar:
"الآن ، أنت الوحيد المتبقي ، سيدتي." لقد تجسدت من جديد كابنة لبارون في رواية قرأتها في حياتي السابقة. بفضل ذلك علمت أن الصبي الذي أحضره والدي ليكون عبدًا سيقتل الباروني ، وسأواجه موتًا مروّعًا ، ونهاية هذا العالم. لقد عملت بجد من أجل تجنب هذا المصير البائس ، لكن كل شيء كان هباءً. في النهاية ، على يد الشخص الذي استيقظ كالساحر الكبير مات أبي وجميع الخدم. والآن سأموت أيضًا ... هل هذا ما اعتقدته؟ "أردت أن أبقيك يا سيدتي." بدأ شرير هذا العالم يصبح مهووسًا بي. ... ولكن لم يكن هناك أي شيء مثل هذا في الأصل؟ أصبحت فاليتا التي بدأت في الابتعاد عن العمل الأصلي أقرب إلى الحقيقة المظلمة لهذا العالم. من العائلة الإمبراطورية المتورطة في الشؤون القذرة وظهور وحوش مجهولة. لقد أرادت فقط أن تعيش بحرية ولكن في وضع تحتاج فيه إلى إنقاذ العالم أولاً! هل ستتمكن فاليتا من العثور على الحياة التي تريدها؟

---

description.en:
One day, my father gave me a boy slave. He said he saved him from the battlefield due to his good looks.

"He has a seal engraved on his heart. As long as you have this bead, he won't be able to disobey you. So you can order him to do anything."

The boy looked rather grim after hearing what he was I ordered. Ah, was I treating him too much like a dog? As my father squeezed the bead, the boy then knelt at my feet.

"Master," his red eyes flashed, illuminating his eerie gaze while smiling madly.

Why is he like this to me?! I tried my best to treat him properly!

---
Reborn as the daughter of a count she read about in a novel, Lady Valeta knows the story ends in tragedy at the hands of her lowly house pet, Reinhart. Having never wanted him in the first place, Valeta tries but fails to oust him from her house. But when Reinhart's powerful magic is awakened one day, he kills all those around her, and it is now Valeta who is at his mercy. Though the tables have turned, Reinhart can't shake his attachment for Valeta. He lets her live, but only within his grasp.

---

description.fr:
Un jour, mon père m’a donné un garçon esclave. Il a dit qu’il l’avait sauvé du champ de bataille grâce à sa bonne mine. « Il a un sceau gravé sur son coeur. Tant que tu as cette perle, il ne pourra pas te désobéir. Donc vous pouvez lui ordonner de faire n’importe quoi. » Le garçon avait l’air plutôt sinistre après avoir entendu ce que je lui ordonnais. Ah, est-ce que je le traitais trop comme un chien ? Alors que mon père pressait la perle, le garçon s’est agenouillé à mes pieds. « Maître » Ses yeux rouges ont clignoté, illuminant son regard sinistre tout en souriant follement. Pourquoi est-il comme ça avec moi ? ! J’ai fait de mon mieux pour le traiter correctement !

---

description.id:
Terlahir sebagai putri dari Count dalam novel yang dibacanya, Valleta tahu cerita ini berakhir dengan insiden atas ulah budaknya, Reinhart. Valleta yang tidak pernah menginginkan dirinya sejak awal, berusaha keras mengusirnya tapi gagal. Suatu hari saat kekuatan sihir Reinhart bangkit, dia membunuh semua orang, dan sekarang Valleta yang berada dalam belas kasihannya. Meskipun situasi sudah berbalik, Reinhart tidak mampu membunuh Valleta. Dia membiarkan wanita itu hidup, tapi dalam pengawasannya.

description.ko:
"자, 이제 너만 남았네. 주인님."

전생에 읽었던 소설 속 백작 영애로 환생했다. 

덕분에 아버지가 내 노예라고 데려온 한 소년에 의해 백작 가문이 몰살당하는 것도,
내가 끔찍한 죽음을 맞이한다는 것도,
이 세계의 결말도 알 수 있었다. 

그 비참한 운명을 피하기 위해 노력했지만 모두 헛수고였다. 
결국 대마법사로 각성한 그의 손에 아버지와 시종들은 모두 죽었다. 
이제 나도 죽.....을줄 알았는데?

"난 주인님이 가지고 싶었거든."

이 세계의 흑막이 나에게 집착하기 시작한다. 

.....이런 건 원작에 없었는데?

원작에서 벗어난 발레타는 조금씩 이 세계의 어두운 진실에 가까워져간다.
더러운 수작질을 벌이고 있었던 황실부터, 정체를 알 수 없는 마물들의 등장까지.

자유롭게 살고 싶었을 뿐인데 세상부터 먼저 구해야하는 상황!
과연 발레타는 원하는 삶을 찾을 수 있을까?

---

description.uk:
Одного дня мій батько подарував мені прислугу. Він сказав, що врятував його, забравши з поля бою, через гарну зовнішність. «На його серці вирізьблена печатка. Поки ти матимеш цей кулон, він не зможе протистояти тобі. Отже, ти можеш наказати йому зробити все, що завгодно.». Почувши, що його воля в моїх руках, хлопець нахмурився.
«Ох, я занадто перебільшую, поводячись із тобою — наче із собакою?», — у цей момент батько стиснув у кулак цю намистину, і хлопець упав на коліна перед моїми ногами.
«Панно…, — його червоні очі блиснули, розкриваючи весь моторошний погляд, а губи розходилися в божевільній посмішці: — Чому він так ставиться до мене?! Я ж так намагався догодити йому!»

---

description.en:
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

_Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name,
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)_

description.en: Princess Eristella was the picture of nobility, an archmage with unparalleled talent. She lived her life without a care and none could humble her, that is until a curse turned her into a small fox.

title.en: My New Friend Wasn't What I Expected

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

altTitles.ja: スプラトゥーン

description.en: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

altTitles.en: A Terrified Teacher at Ghoul School!

altTitles.ja: 妖怪学校の先生はじめました！

altTitles.tr: Ghoul Okulunda Dehşete Düşmüş Bir Öğretmen

description.en: Haruaki is a scaredy-cat with a fetish for girls' school uniforms, but he also wants to be a good teacher. However, his new school isn’t exactly what he thought it would be: it's an academy for monsters, demons, ghosts and all sorts of supernatural creatures!

Duan Fei reborn 20 years ago, a few hours before the Apocalypse, and he can finally make up for something he's regretted for 20 years...

He uses the knowledge he learned in his previous life to arm himself in this life and constantly improve his strength. Duan Fei, who can only survive in the last days, is a world hero in this life...
description.pt-br: Depois que Duan Fei morreu em sua vida anterior, ele renasceu e voltou há 20 anos, algumas horas antes de ser infectado pelo vírus. O arrependimento de Duan Fei por aqueles 20 anos pode finalmente ser remediado usando seus 20 anos de conhecimento de sua vida anterior para se armar no mundo presente. Duan Fei, que obteve a "árvore evolutiva", está constantemente melhorando sua força. Embora ele tenha sido o único sobrevivente na vida anterior, agora ele é um herói mundial nesta vida…

description.en:
He stood at the pinnacle of the world. Surpassing all since birth in the art of the sword. But fate has left him crippled moments before reaching the apex. But the story continues and the legend will rise again…

---
- **Note:** 2nd Place in 15th Chinese Golden Dragon Manhua Awards
description.fr: Il se tenait au sommet du monde. Surpassant tout depuis la naissance dans l'art de l'épée. Mais le destin l'a laissé infirme quelques instants avant d'atteindre le sommet. Mais l'histoire continue et la légende renaîtra…
description.zh: 天下最风流的剑客，名曰沈三公子。 天下最有名的剑法，唤作万藏剑经。 天下最强大最神秘的地方，是为弃剑山庄。 每周六早上九点准时更新~

title.en: I Am Trying to Divorce My Villain Husband, but We Have a Child

altTitles.en: I Plan to Divorce My Villain Husband, but We Have a Child

altTitles.ja: 悪党の夫と離婚しようとしたら子供ができた

altTitles.zh: 正要跟恶棍丈夫离婚, 却突然有了孩子

altTitles.zh-hk: 意外懷上反派丈夫的孩子

altTitles.th: ตั้งใจจะหย่ากับสามีตัวร้าย แต่ฉันดันท้องขึ้นมาซะแล้ว

description.en:
I already possess the body of a woman who will marry the devil. In a role haunted by her husband until death.

"I will always be by your side!"

I've decided to be nice to this poor husband for a while. But before one day, when I had reached adulthood and planned to divorce. A little angel appeared in the night full of surprises. Oh, man. So I tried to run away before being discovered…

"Richard? Something's not right…"

"I have no intention of letting you run away, even if you die, you must stay in my arms. Elisha."

Trying to cry and beg with a pretty face is also not possible.

"Where are you going to take our child?"

Did he even chase after me with those cold eyes? …I guess I was wrong to run away like this. How to solve this situation?

---
After losing her parents at an early age, noble lady Elissa Lohengrin is brought into the powerful House Rubelin by the duke so that she can marry his grandson, Richard. However, having read this story in her past life, Elissa knows Richard is destined to murder her! To avoid this, Elissa makes a deal with Richard to divorce when they become adults. But as she plans for her future single life, Richard's feelings begin to grow, and a whirlwind of events begins that pulls Elissa closer to danger.

altTitles.ja: ツチノコと潮風

description.en:
### "Can you marry my older sister, please?"

Murata was just transferred to become the manager of a supermarket branch in Kureshima, an island in the Chugoku and Shikoku region. That's when Aika, a high-school student who works there part-time, suddenly gave him a strange request. He was having trouble with the staff schedule so, when Aika threatened to quit her job unless he meets up with her sister, he had no choice but to agree. However, when he actually went to visit their home, he found it to be a "Tsuchinoko" museum!?

Just what kind of woman will the older sister who runs a museum turn out to be and why does Aika want Murata to marry her sister? Also, what direction will Murata's sham marriage hunting take...!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

altTitles.ja: 僕の心のヤバイやつ
僕ヤバ

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Estou Sendo Criada por Vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

My Fake Girlfriends are using me as a Shield

description.en: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

title.en: The Duke's Daughter Is Going on Strike

altTitles.en: The Princess Is Going on Strike From Now on
The Princess Is Going on Strike

description.en:
Aeryl Frey Brixia had lived all her life hiding behind a mask.

She was shunned by everyone including the father she craved affection from because of the ugly mark on her face that branded her a monster.

At the end of her miserable life, she was falsely accused of selling military weapons to the enemy nation and sentenced to execution…

The blade of the guillotine dropped and everything went black.

The next time she opened her eyes, she was in her room again as a young girl.

This time, she was determined things will be different. She will no longer be a puppet. She will no longer be manipulated.

And the first thing for her to do is to cooperate with the two officers leading the investigation against her father

I Am Worried Because My Brother Is Too Gentle

altTitles.zh-hk: 哥哥太善良了，真令人担心

altTitles.id: Do Not Hire My Brother, Your Highness!

altTitles.th: กลุ้มใจจัง ท่านพี่ของฉันอ่อนโยนเกินไป

description.en:
I had my share of working overtime for an evil employer. It's no surprise that I died from it! But as if being reborn as Irene Werber, a minor character in a romance novel, wasn't shocking enough, it turns out that my kind older brother is destined to work for the world's most evil superior, Crown Prince Ervin Manuel Terence! It's up to me to stop my brother from being exploited! The only problem is... I don't even know what this prince looks like!

---
“Your Highness! The papers have piled up like this…!”

I reincarnated as Irene Weber, the younger sister of an aide who is suffering from overtime because of the prince who is in love and neglects his work. Irene, who was buried in work before the reincarnation and died of overwork, intends to protect her beloved brother from such a terrible thing.

No overtime! No call after work! Evil boss, go away! Work less and earn more, Brother!

To the end, Irene tries to separate the prince from her brother. A method to win by knowing your enemy and knowing yourself. Irene scraps a little record without leaving any details, of the Prince whose face she doesn’t even know about, for the future. Somehow, her brother’s face, looking at such Irene, is dark…

“Brother, if you’re meeting the Crown Prince today, I’ll go with–”

“Absolutely not.”

'Do you want to meet him alone so much?’

–

“Before that, Benjamin Weber, when can I meet your sister?” 

“Not for the rest of your life.”

The most affectionate brother and sister of the continent. Will the day come when these two siblings can resolve their growing misunderstanding?

---

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

description.en: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
description.fr: La vie de Na Hae-soo se désintègre lorsque son mari la trahit en ayant une liaison, la laissant accablée de dettes et perdant leur enfant. Dans un coup dévastateur, elle le surprend avec une femme plus jeune. Brisée et désespérée, Na Hae-soo sent sa vie s'effondrer autour d'elle. Cependant, un jeune homme mystérieux entre soudainement dans sa vie, lui demandant de lui enseigner l'amour adulte. Sa vulnérabilité et sa sincérité commencent à éveiller des émotions en Na Hae-soo, l'incitant à reconsidérer son chemin vers l'avenir.
description.id: Kehidupan Na Haesoo berubah ketika suaminya mengkhianatinya dengan berselingkuh, membuatnya terlilit hutang dan kehilangan anak mereka. Setelah itu, ia mendapati suaminya bersama seorang wanita yang lebih muda. Dengan perasaan hancur dan putus asa, Na Haesoo merasa kehidupannya di sekelilingnya runtuh dan hancur. Namun, seorang pemuda misterius tiba-tiba memasuki hidupnya, Beom Taeha, yang meminta untuk diajari tentang cinta orang dewasa. Keluguan dan ketulusannya mulai mengusik emosi dalam diri Na Haesoo, dan menantangnya untuk mempertimbangkan kembali langkah apa yang akan diambil.

description.en: When a BL comic artist transmigrated into the princess of Liao, she resumed her career... but encountered her "dear son" who crawled out of the book and refused to be gay! Faced with a sword to her neck, will she surrender or resist? What's worse, the plot is no longer under her control; who's the mysterious person behind the scenes controlling everything?

altTitles.ja: ダメ人間の愛しかた

altTitles.en: How to Love a Useless Person

description.en:
"No talent, no money, no education. A worthless person, bottom of the barrel."
"But... just seeing you like that makes me feel so happy."
Shinba, an unemployed young man, is what someone could call a useless person.
For some reason, such a man is dating a cool and beautiful woman named Hizumi.

For the sake of Hizumi, whom he loves very much, Shinba tries to graduate from being a useless person, but his efforts are always in vain.

She ridicule, sneers and deny him. She whisper words of love to him and stays by his side.

An imbalanced love story, presented by a useless man and a devilish girlfriend, open its curtains to the world.
description.pt-br:
"Sem talento, sem dinheiro, sem educação. Uma pessoa sem valor, no fundo do poço."
"Mas... só de te ver assim me faz tão feliz."
Shinba, um jovem desempregado, é o que alguém poderia chamar de uma pessoa inútil.
Por algum motivo, esse homem está namorando uma mulher legal e bonita chamada Hizumi.

Pelo bem de Hizumi, a quem ele ama muito, Shinba tenta se formar como uma pessoa útil, mas seus esforços são sempre em vão.

Ela ridiculariza, zomba e o nega. Sussurra palavras de amor para ele e fica ao seu lado.

Uma história de amor desequilibrada, apresentada por um homem inútil e uma namorada diabólica, abre suas cortinas para o mundo.

altTitles.en: I'm in Trouble Because My Husband Is So Cute

altTitles.zh: 我的丈夫可爱到令人为难

altTitles.ja: 私の夫が可愛すぎて困る

altTitles.mn: Нөхөр маань хэтэрхий өхөөрдөм болохоор надад асуудал байна

description.en:
‘I was sad just for being reincarnated with a dirt spoon, and now you’re telling me I also have to marry because of a debt?’

Not just that, but the person who will be my husband is the Heir Apparent of Duke Hessenweitz, the monster from all those horrifying rumors!

“A monster doesn’t deserve good treatment.”

However, in the castle of the duke, I saw my young husband being abused for being a monster. I felt pity for my young husband and since he was more like a younger brother to me, I tried to be a little nicer to him…

“You are my miracle and my salvation.”

Only… I didn’t expect this kind of reaction at all? And not just that…

“If I had a daughter who resembles my wife, she would be like you!”

No, why are you doing this to me? Even the father-in-law who had a bad temper? Can I survive in this duke’s castle safely?

---
Upon marrying into the powerful Hessenweitz duchy, Ellie Blanchett arrives at her new home and quickly learns that behind the prestige lies a deeply dysfunctional family. Her husband Zachary, heir to the duchy, is considered a monster by his own father, who scorns him for his supernatural powers. But as Ellie discovers, her husband is not only kind, but cute too! Stuck in the middle of this father-son drama, can Ellie help Zachary accept his powers and stand up to his dad once and for all?

---

Dopo essersi sposata con l'erede del potente duca di Hessenweitz, Ellie Blanchett arriva nella sua nuova casa e scopre rapidamente che dietro il prestigio si nasconde una famiglia profondamente disfunzionale. Suo marito Zachary, erede del ducato, è considerato un mostro dal padre, che lo disprezza per i suoi poteri soprannaturali. Ma come scopre Ellie, suo marito non è solo gentile, ma anche carino! Bloccata nel mezzo di questo dramma padre-figlio, Ellie può aiutare Zachary ad accettare i suoi poteri e tenere testa a suo padre una volta per tutte?

description.ko:
가문의 빚 대신 결혼하게 된 이엘리 블랑쳇.
게다가 남편 될 사람은 무시무시한 소문의 헤센바이츠 소공작이었다!

"괴물에게는 치료 따윈 필요 없다."

그런데 막상 가 본 공작 성에서는, 어린 내 남편이 괴물이라며 학대를 당하고 있었다.
어린 남편이 불쌍하기도 하고, 동생 같기도 해서 조금 잘해 줬을 뿐인데......

"넌 내 기적이고 구원이야."

......이런 반응은 전혀 예상하지 못했는데요?

description.zh: 伊莉 ∙ 布兰切用婚姻解决了家族的债务 再加上将要成为她丈夫的人是有着可怕传闻的海森伯茨小公爵！ “怪物不需要治疗” 但实际上在她去往的公爵城里，年幼的丈夫被称作怪物并遭受着虐待 她觉得这样的丈夫很可怜，还觉得他很像弟弟，所以就对他好了一些... “你是我的奇迹，是我的救赎” ....完全没想到会是这种反应啊？

altTitles.ja: テムパル〜アイテムの力〜

description.de:
Shin Youngwoo spielt mit seinem Avatar "Grid" das zurzeit beliebteste Virtual-Reality-Spiel der Welt: Satisfy.  
  
Ob in der Realität oder in-game, Shin scheint vom Unglück verfolgt zu werden. Doch als er nach der Suche nach einem Questgegenstand seine Belohnung erhält, kann er zu einer legendären Klasse wechseln. Einer Klasse, die außer ihm niemand der über 2 Milliarden Spielern besitzt.
description.en:
Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….
description.fa:
⁧⁧بزرگ‌ترین بازی واقعیت مجازی جهان «ستیسفای».  
⁧چه تو واقعیت و چه در دنیای مجازی شینگ وو کسی بود که همه‌ی بدبختی‌ها سرش می‌اومد.  
⁧اما تو میون این‌همه بدبختی‌، یه‌بار شانس بهش رو می‌کنه و تو یه مأموریت غیرممکن کتاب پاگما رو پیدا می‌کنه، کتابی افسانه‌ای که زندگی اون رو از این رو به اون رو می‌کنه.
description.fr:
Quand un joueur raté de VMMORPG tombe, lors d’une quête, sur un livre légendaire permettant de changer de classe, il en profite immédiatement. Attention joueurs, le plus grand de tous les forgerons est né ! Et il n‘a pas prévu de passer inaperçu !

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/overgeared)
description.id:
Shin Youngwoo punya kehidupan yang bernasib sial. Ia terpaksa bekerja kasar di sebuah tempat kontruksi untuk membayar biaya sekolah dan uang game yang ia gunakan. Bahkan ia juga kerja kasar di VR Game yang bernama Satisfy. Namun, hidupnya mulai berubah ketika karakternya sebagai 'Grid' di game menemukan 'Pagma's Rare Book' hingga menjadi legendary class player.

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kekuatan-Item/3406)
description.ja:
世界最高のバーチャルリアリティゲーム<SATISFY>。 全世界ユーザー数２０億人、もう一つの地球と呼ばれるほどの壮大なファンタジーゲーム。 しがない無職のゲーム中毒者である「長嶺巧」はゲーム課金の借金を返すために日雇い労働をする以外のほとんどの時間はゲームに費やしていた。 ある日、クエスト中にレジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞を手に入れた「巧」。 ＜ファグマの奇書＞売って大儲けできると思ったその瞬間…！新たなクエストが発動され殺される寸前になるが… このままだと殺され、レジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞もなくしてしまうと思った「巧」は＜ファグマの奇書＞を開き、伝説の職人＜ファグマの末裔＞へとジョブチェンジするが… 借金まみれの底辺人生から２０億プレイヤーの頂点に立つレジェンダリープレイヤーになれるのか！？

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/43170)
description.ko:
[신영우 (유저 네임: 그리드)]
세계 최고의 가상 현실 게임 <SATISFY>.

현실에서나, 게임 속에서나, 불운은 항상 그의 곁을 맴도는데....
퀘스트 수행 중 우연히 발견한 게임 속 로또, '파그마의 기서'. 
20억 명이 넘는 유저 중 유일한 최강의 레전드리 직업으로 전직.

"어떻게 아직 살아있는 거지...?!"

"뭐, 특별한 건 없고..."


"템빨이죠."

지긋지긋한 불운과 악몽 같은 빚쟁이 인생에서 벗어난
최강 플레이어 "그리드".
고인물도 울고 갈 끝판왕이 찾아온다!

[<SATISFY>에 접속합니다.]

웹툰 <템빨>은 매주 토요일 연재됩니다.
description.ru: В реальности, в играх, где бы он ни был, ему сопутствуют неудачи... Но в один момент всё меняется. В игре конце Северной пещеры он обнаружит квест, в котором найдёт "Редкую книгу Пагмы"... Ему удастся то, что не удалось сотням миллионов пользователей. - Как ты выжил? - Ничего особенного.
description.th:
ชินยองอู ID กริด ไม่ว่าจะในชีวิตจริงหรือในในโลกเกมเสมือนจริง SATISFY เขาก็เป็นตัวแทนแห่งความอับโชคไม่ต่างกัน...
แต่อยู่มาวันหนึ่ง กริด ได้พบกับตำราเปลี่ยนอาชีพที่นำเขาไปสู่การเปลี่ยนเป็นอาชีพระดับตำนาน 'ทายาทของแพ็กม่า'
อาชีพช่างตีเหล็กในตำนานที่จะทำให้เขาหลุดพ้นจากหนี้สิน พร้อมกับได้สัมผัส 'พลังแห่งไอเทม' และก้าวสู่การเป็นผู้เล่นที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุด!

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Overgeared/43)
description.zh:
无论是现实世界还是游戏世界中，他都是最底层的存在！然而咸鱼翻身的机会终于来了！只要能够找到游戏中的最强装备，就能获得超20亿玩家中唯一一个成为传说中最强职业电竞选手的机会！他能否在假想现实游戏世界中创造新的传奇，成功脱离如同噩梦般的悲惨人生呢？

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28630)
description.zh-hk:
[申英宇(使用者名稱：格里德)]
稱霸全球的虛擬實境遊戲《SATISFY》

無論現實還是遊戲中，他都是個「不幸」的象徵...
在解任務時偶然發現
遊戲中的樂透——「帕格瑪的奇書」，
並轉職成20億玩家中，僅只一名的最強傳奇級職業。

「你怎麼還活著...?!」

「嗯...也沒什麼啦...」

「靠裝備囉。」

脫離不幸與惡夢般的債務，
重生為最強玩家的「格里德」!
經典名著通通滾開，真正的王者駕到了!

[已成功登入《SATISFY》。]

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%A3%9D%E5%82%99%E4%BB%94/47)

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

altTitles.en: Time Slip of the Fist King

description.en:
In a world where humans enslave other races, the archmage ‘Laefenhart’ is treated as the Demon King by the humans for his sins of helping the other races. 

A group of Heroes came to subdue the Demon King! ‘Laefenhart’ succeeds in causing great damage to the Hero party, but ends up being in danger of being killed by the Fist King, ‘Tesron’…

“Space-Time Return Spell.”

The magic spell cast as a last resort miraculously succeeds and sends ‘Laefenhart’ to the past. However…

I became one of the Heroes, the Fist King, ‘Tesron’, who had the strongest body on the continent?!

The archmage ‘Laefenhart’, with his newly acquired physical strength, changes the world with new powers!

title.en: What the Duke Picked up in the Forest

altTitles.en: The Duke Picked up Something in the Forest

altTitles.fr: Ce qui le duc ramassa dans la forêt

altTitles.es: El duque cogió algo en el bosque
Lo que el duque recogió en el bosque

description.en:
“I’m going to do this for the last time, so let me go back with my memories.”

Those who died for me 29 times... I wanted to protect you with my own hands at least once. I want to protect those poor and pitiful 'my people.'

Thus, Elysia's 30th and last regression began. Everything began to change as if fate had been twisted into place. A child who was born without a ‘sign’ in a family that received God’s protection and lived a harsh life. I gradually realize that the beginning of the curse disguised as God's blessing all started with one person...
description.fr: Élisia Creed est de retour dans son corps de 10 ans."Mais pourquoi à ce moment précis ?"La personne qui l'a sauvée, qui était presque la proie des chiens sauvages dans la forêt de minuit, est le duc Balne, le protagoniste de toutes sortes de rumeurs dangereuses.Elle a vécue 29 vies dans le malheur à cause de sa belle-mère, qui cherche désespérément à la tuer, et de son père froid et négligent. C'était la dernière chance que Dieu lui a donnée. Avec l'aide du duc, Élysia change son destin.
description.zh:
重生30次遇见危险公爵
这次要亲手改变不幸的命运
艾莉希雅·克雷德回来了！再一次回到了自己儿时的身体里。这倒不是坏事，可为什么偏偏回到了这个时间点啊？在午夜的森林里，有着各种危险传闻的瓦尔恩公爵，救了差点被一群野狗撕咬的她。因为绞尽脑汁想要夺走她的性命的继母，和对此冷眼旁观、放任不管的父亲，艾莉希雅过了29次悲惨的人生。这是神给予她的最后一次机会，这一次艾莉希雅在公爵的帮助之下，开始了改写自己命运的故事！

description.en:
"Never forgive me."
Margret, who was brutally murdered by her lover, is reborn 7 years later as 'Meg'. Will 'Meg', who doesn't know anything about the world, be able to acclimate well into her new life...? A story uncovering the truth behind her death and the growing love between the characters!
description.fr:
Terriblement assassinée par son amant, Margaret renaît sous le nom de Mag sept ans plus tard et vit une nouvelle vie.

Mag, qui ne connaissait pas le monde, pourra-t-elle s'adapter à sa nouvelle vie ?
description.ko:
"저를 용서하지 마세요."
 
사랑하는 연인에게 끔찍하게 살해당한 마가렛은
7년 후 '매그'로써 다시 태어나 새로운 삶을 살아간다.
 
세상 물정 모르던 '매그'는 새로운 삶을 잘 적응해 나갈 수 있을까...?
그녀의 죽음에 얽힌 진상과 인물들의 성장 러브 스토리!

altTitles.ja: 異能力者エスティオ

description.en:
"Are you the one who called me…?"

A black-haired beast looked at him with glowing yellow eyes.

"It’s okay. It won't hurt anymore. You'll be okay."

Estio was born as the youngest son of a farmer, but everyone hated him. He was a child who could read the hearts of people and animals. And…

"A cursed child."

He finally turned 19, and it was now time for his coming-of-age ceremony. Now starts Estio's journey to find happiness.

---
Estio is just an ordinary farmer's son, but with an extraordinary ability-he can read the thoughts and memories of humans and animals. For this, he is shunned by the people in his village, finding happiness only in his animal friends. After years of silently enduring the villagers' hostility, Estio runs away the night he turns 19. His journey brings unexpected friendships and encounters, but will such bonds be able to show him there is more to him and his ability than meets the eye?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.fr:
«Es-tu celui qui m'a appelé...?»

Une bête aux cheveux noirs l'a regardé avec des yeux jaunes brillants.

«Tout va bien. Ça ne fera plus mal. Tu vas t'en sortir.»

Éstio est né comme le plus jeune fils d'un fermier, mais tout le monde le détestait. C'était un enfant qui pouvait lire dans le cœur des gens et des animaux. Et...

«Un enfant maudit.»

Il a finalement eu 19 ans, et c'est maintenant le moment de sa cérémonie de passage à l'âge adulte. Maintenant commence le voyage d'Éstio pour trouver le bonheur.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.ko:
"날 부른 게... 당신입니까?"
까만 털의 짐승이 노랗게 빛나는 눈으로 그를 올려다보았다.
"이제 괜찮습니다. 더는 아프지 않을 겁니다. 괜찮으니까."

농가의 막내 아들로 태어난 소년 에스티오.
하지만 모든 사람들은 그를 미워했다.
사람과 동물들의 마음을 읽는 아이.
그리고...

"저주 받은 아이"

마침내 열아홉 살을 맞이한 성년식.
행복을 찾기 위한 에스티오의 여정이 지금 시작된다.

—

공든탑 작가님의 웹소설 인기작 <에스티오> 본격 웹툰화!
사람과 동물의 마음을 치유하는 여스티오의 여정에 함께 하세요!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.ru:
«Это ты звал меня?» Черношёрстный зверь смотрел на него снизу своими жёлтыми сияющими глазами. «Теперь всё хорошо. Больше не будет больно. Поэтому всё хорошо». Эстио – младший сын, рождённый в семье фермера. Но все люди его презирали. Он ребёнок, который читает души животных и людей. И… «Ребёнок, получивший проклятие». Наконец, церемония взросления, которая проводится, как только человеку исполняется 19 лет. И вот Эстио отправляется в путешествие, чтобы обрести своё счастье. По мотивам веб-романа известного писателя Кон Дынтхапа.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)

description.en:
The downfall of a noble family. And a girl who risks her life seeking revenge.

“Lady Ayana.”

There was a knight who had been by her side for thirteen years. The person who came to her mind before her own family was going to be annihilated. He risked his life for her, suffered wounds, hunger, and gave her everything. Now, he is looking at her while she’s waiting for her execution with a joyful smile.

“Please show me another enjoyable story this time, my lady.”

The devil smiled and extended his hand, and the girl took it.

“I hope you get the ending you desire in the next story, my lady.”

(Source: Kakao, translated)
description.es: Ella tuvo que pasar por la aniquilación de su familia, él llegó al final de su vida para darle la oportunidad de vengarse. “Aiana.” El caballero que estuvo a mi lado durante 13 años, arriesgó su vida, sufrió, pasó hambre y lo dio todo por mí. Pero ahora, al presentarse mi muerte inminente, sonreía felizmente mientras contemplaba mi desceso. “Por favor, ten una historia agradable esta vez, mi señora”. El demonio sonrió y me tendió la mano. “Espero que en la próxima historia obtengas el final que deseas”

altTitles.ja: メイキャッパー

description.en: (from ebookjapan):Miake Kousei, a man who brings out the "beauty" and "love" hidden in everyone, arrives at the grand stage! This is the rumored debut work by the genius Keisuke Itagaki!

altTitles.ja: スーパーカブ

description.en:
In early summer, 2nd year of high school, Koguma's mom suddenly abandons her, leaving only a note that says "Bye." She is alone, having no parents, no friends, no hobbies. She silently reflects, "I don't have anything." But a chance encounter results in her buying a Honda Super Cub with a disturbing history, and a new life suddenly blossoms open.  
  
Based on the [light novel series with the same name](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Super_Cub_(novel_series)).
description.it: Koguma vive a Yamanashi e frequenta le superiori, ma le sue giornate scivolano via vuote e monotone: non ha amici, non ha hobby, ed essendo orfana si sente molto sola. Un giorno compra una Honda Super Cub usata e la utilizza per andare a scuola. Iniziano così una serie di piccole avventure: resta a secco, si perde, scopre nuovi percorsi e deviazioni. Grazie alla moto, Koguma fa anche la conoscenza di Reiko, una sua compagna di classe che un giorno all'improvviso inizia a parlare di motociclette...
description.pt-br:
No 2°ano do ensino médio, início de verão, a mãe de Koguma a abandonou repentinamente, deixando a apenas um bilhete escrito: "Adeus". Ela está sozinha, sem pais, amigos e sem hobbies. Silenciosamente ela pensa: "Eu não tenho nada". Mas um motivo aparece quando ela compra uma Honda Super Cub de uma forma bem peculiar, e assim uma nova vida floresce inesperadamente.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 5, Cap 26. ]

description.en: With its long-awaited freshman/student athletes aboard, Mizuho High's basketball team practices with a hope to play in the national tournaments. In the prefectural preliminary games, the young athletes compete with their rivals at Shonandai-Sagami, Honmoku-Higashi and Yokohama Gakuen Highs. Will Mizuho compete in the national tournaments and once again confront Narita-Chuo and Meiwadai-Hitachi Highs? And finally how will the players fare in a game against the high school basketball champion team at Tendoji? The struggles of the newly reborn Mizuho basketball team to become the national champion begin!

title.en: Konjiki no Word Master - Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat

altTitles.en: The Golden Word Master - The Four Heroes and the Innocent Bystander with the Unique Cheat

altTitles.ru: Мастер золотых слов: Четыре героя и Наблюдатель с Уникальным читом

altTitles.ja: 金色の文字使い-勇者四人に巻き込まれたユニークチート-

altTitles.ko: 금색의 문자술사: 워드 마스터 유니크 치트

description.en:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.
description.pt-br: Okamura Hiiro é introvertido e adora livros. Para ele, os livros são a sua razão de ser. Sua história começa com costume de invocar heróis de outro mundo. Cinco pessoas convocados, mas um deles é apenas um estranho arrastado acidentalmente, essa pessoa é Hiiro. Os outros quatro são seus colegas de classe, mas não é como se eles fossem amigos. Ao contrário dele, eles são riajuus (Pessoas normais na sociedade contrário de Otaku). Hiiro decidiu não para ajudar o país, a sua razão? "Eu não acredito em você. Eu não sou amigo deles. Não é da minha conta, e eu sou uma pessoa comum que se importa com a minha própria vida, então bye", e ele estabelece a sua própria jornada. Pouco sabem os outros heróis, que esta pessoa comum, Hiiro, na verdade esconde um poder que poderá mudar o mundo!

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.en: Leisurely Farmer in an Alternate Universe
Carefree Farmer in a Different Dimension

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

altTitles.fa: من یک قطعه درجه اسطوره ای بدست آوردم

description.en:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…
description.ko:
D급 무투계 레이더,
최강의 귀속 아이템으로
세계를 구할 신의 대적자가 되다!
description.ru: Я получил единственный в мире мифический предмет. Но что? Этот предмет принадлежит мне?

description.en:
Callia Taxicate was a mere commoner until she saved the life of Simon Tereloane, the son of a duke. In return, the duke helps make her commander of the emperor's knights and she becomes a war hero. 

Though she only sees Simon as a friend, the two unexpectedly spend the night together and she ends up pregnant! Terrified that he and his noble family won't accept a child out of wedlock, Callia runs away to raise the baby on her own. But how long can she hide this secret, especially from the father?!
description.uk:
Калія — геройка війни та полковниця, яка поклала край минулому кровопролиттю. Але одного разу вона дізнається, що... вагітна?!
З усіх людей, батьком дитини є Саймон Терроан, її найкращий друг і архімаг, з яким Калія провела одну пристрасну ніч.
Вважаючи, що він не хоче немовля, вона приховує правду про свою вагітність, звільняється з роботи й зникає, щоб народити маля, поки Терроан був відсутній. 
Але правда в тому, що Саймон любив Калію більше, ніж будь-кого. І ось, починаються невпинні пошуки коханої.

description.en:
Is my cursed husband's fate up to me?
Madelyn's husband Ian was left broken after the war, and in turn, made her life a living hell. Fleeing her doomed marriage, she meets a tragic end. But when she opens her eyes, she finds herself at 17 again. The war has yet to start, and Madelyn can still change her fate. But what about Ian?
description.pt-br:
O destino do meu maldito marido depende de mim?
O marido de Madelyn, Ian, ficou destroçado depois da guerra e, por sua vez, tornou a vida dela um inferno. Fugindo de seu casamento condenado, ela encontra um fim trágico. Mas quando ela abre os olhos, ela se vê novamente com 17 anos. A guerra ainda não começou e Madelyn ainda pode mudar o seu destino. Mas e Ian?

title.en: The Weakest Student is Actually the Strongest Sage

altTitles.ja-ro: Sono Rettōsei, Jitsu wa Saikyō Kenja

altTitles.ja: その劣等生、実は最強賢者

description.en: People around me called me a sage who was obsessed with the Philosopher's Stone." There was once a man who mastered magic and was known as a sage. Realizing that creating the Philosopher's Stone was impossible with his current body, he took a gamble. He decided to reincarnate into a future world as a different person to obtain a new, stronger body. His reincarnation was successful, and he gained the body of a cute boy named Mars, marked with the emblem of strength, the "Pure Seal." However, in the future, this emblem was inexplicably regarded as a "Defective Seal"...! All for the sake of the Philosopher's Stone. The journey of the strongest sage begins anew!!

altTitles.th: องค์หญิงห้องใต้หลังคา

altTitles.ja: 屋根裏部屋の皇女様

description.en:
I've lived in this little hell ever since I was born for being the daughter of a gypsy who carries misfortune. The Trump Empire killed my innocent mother. The emperor, the temple, and the whole empire locked me up, abused me, resented me, and abandon me. Their abandonment is an opportunity, Here in the kingdom of Jardine, I will begin my revenge. The Trump Empire, may it dry up a little more. The dryness will soon be a precious stream for me. …I will start my revenge.

---
Branded as a cursed child, Princess Osiria spent most of her life locked in an attic. In actuality, Osiria is the divinely chosen, the one who could’ve saved the empire of Trionfo. Instead, she was sold to a neighboring kingdom and left in the care of Sir Fedelius, a handsome young knight. Although her heart beats faster when Fedelius is around, she doesn’t plan on staying for long. She wants only one thing… to get revenge on those who abused her and killed her mother. Will her heart soften with love or will she seek vengeance to the very end?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/50688024)

description.fr:
Pendant 20 longues années, l'Empire a connu une immense sécheresse. La coupable? Une de ses propres princesses. Surnommée la «Princesse du grenier,» elle serait celle responsable de ce malheur. Pour la punir, elle a donc été enfermée dans un grenier et a été traitée pire qu'un chien pendant 20 ans. Enfin, pour pouvoir importer de l'eau, l'Empire décide d'offrir la princesse au royaume voisin. Pour survivre, la princesse accepte son sort et prétend être une idiote. Mais la réalité est tout autre et la princesse pourrait être bien plus spéciale que ce qu'il paraît.

---

description.zh-hk:
自從我出生以來，我就一直生活在這個小地獄裡，在一個單獨的、黑暗而狹窄的閣樓裡。

因為我是一個惹禍的吉普賽人的女兒。

特朗普帝國殺死了我無辜的母親。

帝王神殿，全帝國囚禁我，虐待我，怨恨我，拋棄我。

他們的遺棄是一個機會，在扎爾丁王國，我將開始復仇。

---

description.en:
"If you wish, I don’t mind dying."

The tyrant Ludwig Magenta has met his end at the hands of Empress Olive Charlotte. The moment he accepted death, he opened his eyes in the garden where he first met her at the age of twelve. 

If he starts again from the beginning, can he change his tragic life? 

Only time will tell if Ludwig’s quest for Olive’s love will succeed.

altTitles.ja: 捨てられた王女、反逆します！

description.en:
"A woman with red eyes brings a curse."

Because of this legend, Rowena was abandoned overnight. With the help of his mother's friend and the guardian of the northern Werner region, the Duke of Conrad, she discovers that her eyes are not evidence of a curse, but of "power"... With the birth of 'Heinrich' from the palace 'Granzel', Rowena, who has been forced to take only bridal classes for arranged marriages because of the lack of estrangement from the throne, begins to move on her own rather than stand still... Clearly, someone is putting all the characters associated with them at risk. Rowena begins to investigate the cone that led to all of this.
description.pt-br:
“Uma mulher com olhos vermelhos traz uma maldição.”

'Rowena', uma bela princesa conhecida, um dia fica com os olhos vermelhos devido a um incêndio repentino. Há uma lenda que é transmitida no continente desde os tempos antigos.

'Uma mulher com olhos vermelhos traz uma maldição.'

Rowena é abandonada durante a noite por causa dessa lenda. Então, com a ajuda do 'Duque Konrad', amigo de sua mãe e guardião da região norte de Werner, ele descobre que seus olhos não são evidências de uma maldição, mas sim 'evidências de poder mágico'...

Rowena, que só foi forçada a ter aulas de noivas por causa de um casamento arranjado, começou a se mudar sozinha,
Em vez de ficar parada… Rowena começa a investigar a causa de tudo isso.
Claramente, alguém está colocando todos contra ela.

description.en:
What's so great about being the daughter of a duke anyway? 

As the youngest child of a crazy duke with no empathy for his kids, Elena wants to live quietly and avoid her family’s bullying. But when she ends up being followed by Sirius Hyperion, the illegitimate child of the emperor and the person foretold to bring down her family, Elena decides to sit back and watch their demise. 

But will sticking with Sirius allow Elena to break free from her family, or will she become one of his many victims?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EA%B3%B5-%EC%98%86%EC%97%90-%EB%B6%99%EC%96%B4%EB%A7%8C-%EC%9E%88%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3239), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60956369)
description.zh: 穿进小说的娇软萝莉艾蕾娜一心只想做“废物”，却被疯批正太黏上？！拜托，这可是长大后主打复仇和杀戮的男主！明知道不应该和他过于亲近，但看着弱小的他受伤、痛苦，完全无法放任不管啊。既然是男主的话，只要待在他身边，就算做个“废物“，应该也能好好活下去吧......

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

description.en:
An unfamiliar world that suddenly fell. Unfamiliar language, a zombie called Mannock, an uneven situation. A man who appeared when even hope was lost in repeated despair.  
  
 "A stranger?"  
  
 She was the savior she met. Baek Hee-su, who wants to return to the original world, picked up a woman who needs a lot of hands in many ways. What should I do with this woman?   
  
“If I think you're waiting for me, I think I can do anything. Anything to come back to you…  
  
"Mercenary and mysterious man who hunts Manoc, Kalix Clovis"   
  
"I will never meet you again when I arrive in the city."   
  
"Okay?"   
  
He carefully held her hand holding my forearm. His bright blue eyes stared straight at her.   
  
"Until then, stay by my side."  


---
description.ru:
Незнакомый мир, в который я неожиданно попала, неизвестный язык, зомби, называемые маноками, опасные обстоятельства…  
Но один мужчина появился в момент, когда испарилась последняя крупица надежды в этом цикле отчаяния.  
  
Первый человек, протянувший мне руку помощи в этом мире, не пытающийся что-то отнять, не желающий мне навредить.  
Меня зовут Бэк Хи Су и я хочу только одного - вернуться в свой прежний мир.  
  
“Когда я думаю, что ты ждешь меня, мне кажется, что я могу горы свернуть, лишь бы вернуться к тебе…”  
“Потому оставайся подле меня.”

title.en: E, Shanai System Subete Wan'ope shiteiru Watashi wo Kaiko desu ka?

altTitles.ja: え、社内システム全てワンオペしている私を解雇ですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: E, Shanai System Subete OneOpe shiteiru Watashi o Kaiko Desu ka?

altTitles.en: Eh, Are You Seriously Going to Fire Me When I’ve Been Handling the Company’s In-House System as a One-Man Show?

description.en:
Satou Ai who has been handling the company's in-house system as a one-man show, has received a notice of dismissal upon a change in president. After the dismissal, Ai was alone in deep sorrows until she stumbled upon Suzuki Kenta. Kenta invites her to join his startup company. The company was something he started to get close to others with the name, "True programmer's cram school" with Ai's unconventional, daring and sometimes wild lectures, the student started to look forward to the lessons. 

To everyone working in a stressful company, this is a story that helps you smile a little for tomorrow's sake.

altTitles.en: There's No Use in Hanging On

description.en:
The love of my life, Rakan became the Emperor. At last, the coronation ceremony I stood by him expecting to become Empress. However, the crown of empress didn’t become mine, it became Vienna’s my younger cousin. I threw everything away to make Rakan the emperor, and all that’s left for me ahead was death. It wasn’t until I was abandoned that I realized he used me. Everything was a ruse. The carefully planned screenplay its main characters being the love of my life Rakan and my cousin, Vienna. I was the only one who didn’t know that. In my last moments I made a promise. If I had another chance, I wouldn’t love you again even if I died. I’ve miraculously returned to the past! To when I was 18, the day all the disharmony began. I made up my mind in tears. This time, I’m going to give everything I’ve got to destroy you Rakan. In my vow of revenge, I began to see something I had never noticed before. My fiancé Paylon, has always looked my way. “Please be on my side. I don’t need love.” I’m not going to let you hang on to me this time!

---
Kaira willingly risked her life to make her beloved Prince Reagan emperor. But when the man she sacrificed it all for crowns her cousin as empress instead of her, she loses the will to live. It’s only when she’s finally succumbed to a lethal dose of poison that she’s met with the tears of a heartbroken Prince Faylon, and she realizes her love was wasted on the wrong person. Vowing to exact revenge if ever given the chance, Kaira is thrust back in time to right the wrongs committed against her and reclaim the title that is rightfully hers. As she joins hands with Prince Faylon and sets out to punish those who conspired against her, she’ll discover a world she once took for granted and seek to correct the course of her fate.

---

description.ko:
사랑하는 남자, 라칸을 위해 내 모든 것을 바쳐 그를 황제로 만들었다.
그리고 드디어 오늘, 나는 그의 곁에서 황후가 될 것을 기대했건만,
황후의 관은 내가 아닌 나의 사촌 여동생, 비에나의 것이 되었다.

"목숨까지 바쳐가며 희생한 내게 남은 것은 독에 중독되어 죽어가는 몸 뿐이라니."
"대체 어디서부터 잘못된 걸까…"

버려지고 나서야 이용당했다는 것을 깨달았다.
그렇게 죽는 순간 다짐했다.
만약 또 한 번의 기회가 있다면 죽어도 라칸, 너만은 사랑하지 않을 것이라고.

그렇게 열여덟 살. 모든 것이 시작되었던 그날로 돌아왔다.

"내 모든 것을 앗아간 라칸, 이번엔 널 처참히 망가뜨려 줄게."

라칸이 아닌, 과거 황제가 억지로 묶어 놓았던 나의 약혼자 페일론.
그를 반드시 황제로 만들 것이다.

"페일론, 사랑 따위 필요 없어요. 계약 하나 하죠."
제 편이 되어 주세요. 그렇게 해주신다면 …"
"반드시 내가 당신을 황제로 만들 것입니다."

"비에나, 라칸. 둘 다 나락으로 떨어뜨려 줄게."

이젠 매달려도 소용없어.

---

description.th:
เมื่อ 'ราคาน' ชายที่ฉันรักกำลังจะได้ขึ้นเป็นจักรพรรดิ แต่ผู้ที่ได้ขึ้นเป็นจักรพรรดินีเคียงข้างเขากลับไม่ใช่ฉัน 'ไคร่า เดอ ออร์เช่' แต่เป็น 'เวียนนา' ลูกพี่ลูกน้องของฉันซะอย่างนั้น ฉันยอมแลกทุกสิ่งทุกอย่าง ยอมถูกวางยาพิษก็เพื่อให้เขาได้เป็นจักรพรรดิ แต่เขาก็ยังทรยศฉัน ในตอนที่กำลังจะตาย ฉันพร่ำพรรณนากับตัวเองว่า ถ้าหากมีโอกาสอีกครั้งละก็ ฉันจะกลับมาแก้แค้นอย่างแน่นอน และแล้วฉันก็ได้ย้อนกลับมาในวันที่ทุกๆ อย่างเริ่มต้นขึ้น ฉันตั้งใจไว้ว่าจะเอาทุกสิ่งทุกอย่างที่เป็นของตัวเองคืนมา แล้วก็จะช่วยให้ 'เฟลลอน' อดีตคู่หมั้นของตัวเองที่เคยถูกองค์จักรพรรดิบังคับให้หมั้นหมายกัน ได้ขึ้นเป็นจักรพรรดิแทนราคาน

altTitles.en: The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Seralization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).
description.es: En la casa donde vive con su hermana, Hi-chan, la amiga de su hermana, se queda frecuentemente. Ella tiene una cara perfectamente linda, y además de eso, no tiene sentido del espacio personal. Asahi, un estudiante de preparatoria otaku, ¿quedará a su merced...? ¡El popular one-shop “The Cutest Girl Closest to Me” ha sido retitulado y serializado!
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

title.en: Bubu to Michelle - Ameagari no Tenshi

altTitles.ja: ブブとミシェル～雨上がりの天使～

altTitles.zh: 布布与米歇尔～雨后的天使～

description.en: Fallen angels would fall from heaven on Sunday mornings. Most of them were dead by the time they reached the ground. The carcasses of fallen angels were a precious food for the poor. One day, a young boy named Michel, who was scavenging the corpses of fallen angels, found an "egg" in the corpse of a fallen angel and brought it home. And a fallen angel was born. What is the future that the two, who met through a prank of fate, will choose?!

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com elegância.
